subject: Re: Order #SSN2591 confirmed
description_text:

I ordered the pedals as confirmed below and I am pretty sure I have 
included the base plate but it is not listed ...

Thanks in advance and regards,

Dietmar Stein

conversations.body_text: Hi Dietmar Stein,  Please don't worry, your order includes the base plate, it is included as an accessory so it will not be displayed.

Hello

I received the package / pedals today, but the VAM Pro haptics modules 
were not included as ordered - could you please check this?

Thanks in advance.

Regards,

Dietmar Stein

Solutions based on Linux

Am Kleinenberg 16
55444 Schweppenhausen

phone: +49 175 19 12 767
mail:contact@dietmarstein.com
www.:https://dietmarstein.com
